   <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">&#xa0;</p>
   <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">(<em style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">1</em>) The gain (loss) on the&#xa0;interest rate swap will be reclassified into interest expense as payments on the derivative agreement are made.&#xa0;Approximately ($<ix:nonFraction id="c54993006" contextRef="d_2020-01-01_2020-12-31_StatementScenarioAxis-ScenarioForecastMember" unitRef="USD" format="ixt:numdotdecimal" decimals="-3" name="us-gaap:ReclassificationFromAociCurrentPeriodNetOfTaxAttributableToParent" scale="3">3,842</ix:nonFraction>) of the ($<ix:nonFraction id="c54993007" contextRef="i_2020-12-31_StatementScenarioAxis-ScenarioForecastMember" unitRef="USD" format="ixt:numdotdecimal" decimals="-3" name="us-gaap:StockholdersEquity" sign="-" scale="3">8,633</ix:nonFraction>) will&#xa0;be reclassified into earnings in the <em style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">12</em> months subsequent to <em style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;"> December 31, 2019.</em></p>
   <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">(<em style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">2</em>) As previously disclosed in our <em style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">10</em>-K/A, unrealized gains of $<ix:nonFraction id="c54993011" contextRef="i_2018-07-01_AdjustmentsForNewAccountingPronouncementsAxis-AccountingStandardsUpdate201601Member_StatementEquityComponentsAxis-AccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeMember" unitRef="USD" format="ixt:numdotdecimal" decimals="-3" name="us-gaap:CumulativeEffectOfNewAccountingPrincipleInPeriodOfAdoption" sign="-" scale="3">24,682</ix:nonFraction> on available-for-sale investments with readily determinable fair vales were included in the <em style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;"> June 30, 2018 </em>Consolidated Balance Sheet and were reclassified into retained earnings at the beginning of fiscal <em style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">2019</em> upon&#xa0;our&#xa0;adoption of ASU <em style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">2016</em>-<em style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">01</em> and ASU <em style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">2018</em>-<em style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">02.</em> The amounts presented in accumulated other comprehensive income as of <em style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;"> June 30, 2018 </em>exclude&#xa0;these unrealized gains subsequently reclassified into retained earnings. &#xa0;</p>
   <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">(<em style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">3</em>) The Company reclassified ($<ix:nonFraction id="c54993019" contextRef="d_2019-07-01_2019-12-31_ReclassificationOutOfAccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeAxis-ReclassificationOutOfAccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeMember_StatementEquityComponentsAxis-AccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeMember" unitRef="USD" format="ixt:numdotdecimal" decimals="-3" name="us-gaap:InterestExpense" scale="3">821</ix:nonFraction>) to interest expense and a related tax benefit tax of $<ix:nonFraction id="c54993020" contextRef="d_2019-07-01_2019-12-31_ReclassificationOutOfAccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeAxis-ReclassificationOutOfAccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeMember_StatementEquityComponentsAxis-AccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeMember" unitRef="USD" format="ixt:numdotdecimal" decimals="-3" name="us-gaap:IncomeTaxExpenseBenefit" sign="-" scale="3">192</ix:nonFraction>&#xa0;during the <em style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">six</em> months ended <em style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;"> December 31, 2019. </em>The Company had deferred tax benefits of $<ix:nonFraction id="c54993022" contextRef="d_2019-07-01_2019-12-31" unitRef="USD" format="ixt:numdotdecimal" decimals="-4" name="us-gaap:DeferredIncomeTaxExpenseBenefit" sign="-" scale="3">2,640</ix:nonFraction> and $<ix:nonFraction id="c54993023" contextRef="d_2018-07-01_2018-12-31" unitRef="USD" format="ixt:numdotdecimal" decimals="-3" name="us-gaap:DeferredIncomeTaxExpenseBenefit" sign="-" scale="3">1,216</ix:nonFraction> included in the accumulated other comprehensive income loss as of&#xa0;&#xa0;<em style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;"> December 31, 2019 </em>and <em style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;"> December 31, 2018, </em>respectively.</p>
  </ix:nonNumeric>

   <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left;">&#xa0;</p>
   <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">The dilutive effect of stock options and restricted stock units in the above table excludes all options for which the aggregate exe<span style="background-color:null;">rcise proceeds exceeded the average market price for the period. The number of potentially dilutive option shares excluded from the calculation was <ix:nonFraction id="c54993326" contextRef="d_2019-10-01_2019-12-31" unitRef="Share" format="ixt:numdotdecimal" decimals="-5" name="us-gaap:AntidilutiveSecuritiesExcludedFromComputationOfEarningsPerShareAmount" scale="6">1.3</ix:nonFraction>&#xa0;</span>million and <ix:nonFraction id="c54993327" contextRef="d_2018-10-01_2018-12-31" unitRef="Share" format="ixt:numdotdecimal" decimals="-5" name="us-gaap:AntidilutiveSecuritiesExcludedFromComputationOfEarningsPerShareAmount" scale="6">1.3</ix:nonFraction> million for the&#xa0;quarter ended <em style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;"> December 31, 2019 </em>and <em style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">2018,</em> respectively and <ix:nonFraction id="c54993329" contextRef="d_2019-07-01_2019-12-31" unitRef="Share" format="ixt:numdotdecimal" decimals="-5" name="us-gaap:AntidilutiveSecuritiesExcludedFromComputationOfEarningsPerShareAmount" scale="6">1.3</ix:nonFraction>&#xa0;million and <ix:nonFraction id="c54993330" contextRef="d_2018-07-01_2018-12-31" unitRef="Share" format="ixt:numdotdecimal" decimals="-5" name="us-gaap:AntidilutiveSecuritiesExcludedFromComputationOfEarningsPerShareAmount" scale="6">1.3</ix:nonFraction> million for the <em style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">six</em> months ended <em style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;"> December 31, 2019 </em>and <em style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">2018</em> respectively.</p>

   <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">Stock options for&#xa0;<ix:nonFraction id="c54993405" contextRef="d_2019-07-01_2019-12-31" unitRef="Share" format="ixt:numdotdecimal" decimals="INF" name="us-gaap:StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesStockOptionsExercised" scale="0">287,595</ix:nonFraction> and <ix:nonFraction id="c54993406" contextRef="d_2018-07-01_2018-12-31" unitRef="Share" format="ixt:numdotdecimal" decimals="INF" name="us-gaap:StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesStockOptionsExercised" scale="0">189,627</ix:nonFraction> shares of common stock with total intrinsic values of $<ix:nonFraction id="c54993407" contextRef="d_2019-07-01_2019-12-31" unitRef="USD" format="ixt:numdotdecimal" decimals="-5" name="us-gaap:ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardOptionsExercisesInPeriodTotalIntrinsicValue" scale="6">35.3</ix:nonFraction> million and $<ix:nonFraction id="c54993408" contextRef="d_2018-07-01_2018-12-31" unitRef="USD" format="ixt:numdotdecimal" decimals="-5" name="us-gaap:ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardOptionsExercisesInPeriodTotalIntrinsicValue" scale="6">16.3</ix:nonFraction> million were exercised during the <em style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">six</em> months ended <em style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;"> December 31, 2019 </em>and <em style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">2018,</em> respectively.</p>
   <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">&#xa0;</p>
   <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">Stock-based compensation expense of $<ix:nonFraction id="c54993411" contextRef="d_2019-10-01_2019-12-31_IncomeStatementLocationAxis-SellingGeneralAndAdministrativeExpensesMember" unitRef="USD" format="ixt:numdotdecimal" decimals="-5" name="us-gaap:AllocatedShareBasedCompensationExpense" scale="6">10.1</ix:nonFraction>.&#xa0;million and $<ix:nonFraction id="c54993412" contextRef="d_2018-10-01_2018-12-31_IncomeStatementLocationAxis-SellingGeneralAndAdministrativeExpensesMember" unitRef="USD" format="ixt:numdotdecimal" decimals="-5" name="us-gaap:AllocatedShareBasedCompensationExpense" scale="6">6.9</ix:nonFraction> million was included in selling, general and administrative expenses for the quarter ended <em style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;"> December 31, 2019 </em>and <em style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">2018,</em> respectively. Stock-based compensation expense of $<ix:nonFraction id="c54993414" contextRef="d_2019-07-01_2019-12-31_IncomeStatementLocationAxis-SellingGeneralAndAdministrativeExpensesMember" unitRef="USD" format="ixt:numdotdecimal" decimals="-5" name="us-gaap:AllocatedShareBasedCompensationExpense" scale="6">18.5</ix:nonFraction>&#xa0;million and $<ix:nonFraction id="c54993415" contextRef="d_2018-07-01_2018-12-31_IncomeStatementLocationAxis-SellingGeneralAndAdministrativeExpensesMember" unitRef="USD" format="ixt:numdotdecimal" decimals="-5" name="us-gaap:AllocatedShareBasedCompensationExpense" scale="6">18.4</ix:nonFraction> million was included in selling, general, and administrative expenses for the <em style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">six</em> months ended <em style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;"> December 31, 2019 </em>and <em style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">2018,</em> respectively. Additionally, the company recognized $<ix:nonFraction id="c54993418" contextRef="d_2019-10-01_2019-12-31_IncomeStatementLocationAxis-CostOfSalesMember" unitRef="USD" format="ixt:numdotdecimal" decimals="-5" name="us-gaap:AllocatedShareBasedCompensationExpense" scale="6">0.5</ix:nonFraction> million and $<ix:nonFraction id="c54993419" contextRef="d_2019-07-01_2019-12-31_IncomeStatementLocationAxis-CostOfSalesMember" unitRef="USD" format="ixt:numdotdecimal" decimals="-5" name="us-gaap:AllocatedShareBasedCompensationExpense" scale="6">0.9</ix:nonFraction>&#xa0;million in cost of goods sold in the quarter and <em style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">six</em> months ended <em style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;"> December 31, 2019 </em>respectively. As of <em style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;"> December 31, 2019, </em>there was $<ix:nonFraction id="c54993421" contextRef="i_2019-12-31" unitRef="USD" format="ixt:numdotdecimal" decimals="-5" name="us-gaap:EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationNonvestedAwardsTotalCompensationCostNotYetRecognized" scale="6">38.2</ix:nonFraction>&#xa0;million of unrecognized compensation cost related to non-vested stock options, non-vested restricted stock units and non-vested restricted stock. The weighted average period over which the compensation cost is expected to be recognized is&#xa0;<ix:nonNumeric contextRef="d_2019-07-01_2019-12-31" name="us-gaap:EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationNonvestedAwardsTotalCompensationCostNotYetRecognizedPeriodForRecognition1" id="c54993422" format="ixt-sec:duryear">2.1</ix:nonNumeric> years.</p>
  </ix:nonNumeric>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">&#xa0;</p>
  <div>
    &#xa0;

       <td style="width: 9%; text-align: right; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin-left: 0pt; border-bottom: 3px double rgb(0, 0, 0);">(<ix:nonFraction id="c54993439" contextRef="d_2018-10-01_2018-12-31" unitRef="USD" format="ixt:numdotdecimal" decimals="-3" name="us-gaap:NonoperatingIncomeExpense" sign="-" scale="3">11,836</ix:nonFraction></td>
       <td style="width: 1%; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin-left: 0pt; padding-bottom: 3px;"> <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:left;">)</p> </td>
       <td style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; padding-bottom: 3px;">&#xa0;</td>
       <td style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; border-bottom: 3px double rgb(0, 0, 0);">&#xa0;</td>
       <td style="text-align: right; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; border-bottom: 3px double rgb(0, 0, 0);"><ix:nonFraction id="c54993440" contextRef="d_2019-07-01_2019-12-31" unitRef="USD" format="ixt:numdotdecimal" decimals="-3" name="us-gaap:NonoperatingIncomeExpense" scale="3">97,812</ix:nonFraction></td>
       <td style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; padding-bottom: 3px;">&#xa0;</td>
       <td style="width: 1%; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; padding-bottom: 3px;">&#xa0;</td>

   </ix:nonNumeric>
   <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left;">&#xa0;</p>

   <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left;">(<em style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">1</em>) The changes in other non-operating income (expense) were driven by changes in the fair value of our CCXI investment as further described in Note <em style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">5</em> above.&#xa0;</p>

  <p style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left">&#xa0;</p>
  <div>
    &#xa0;
  </div>
  <ix:nonNumeric contextRef="d_2019-07-01_2019-12-31" name="us-gaap:IncomeTaxDisclosureTextBlock" id="c1410177" escape="true">
   <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;"><i><b><span style="background-color:null;">Note <em style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">12.</em> Income Taxes:</span></b></i></p>
   <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">&#xa0;</p>
   <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="background-color:null;">The Company&#x2019;s effective income tax rate for the <em style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">second</em> quarter of fiscal <em style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">2020</em> and <em style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">2019</em> was <ix:nonFraction id="c54993446" contextRef="d_2019-10-01_2019-12-31" unitRef="Pure" format="ixt:numdotdecimal" decimals="3" name="us-gaap:EffectiveIncomeTaxRateContinuingOperations" scale="-2">20.4</ix:nonFraction>% and <ix:nonFraction id="c54993447" contextRef="d_2018-10-01_2018-12-31" unitRef="Pure" format="ixt:numdotdecimal" decimals="3" name="us-gaap:EffectiveIncomeTaxRateContinuingOperations" scale="-2">19.3</ix:nonFraction>% of consolidated earnings before income taxes, and <ix:nonFraction id="c54993448" contextRef="d_2019-07-01_2019-12-31" unitRef="Pure" format="ixt:numdotdecimal" decimals="3" name="us-gaap:EffectiveIncomeTaxRateContinuingOperations" scale="-2">20.3</ix:nonFraction>% and <ix:nonFraction id="c54993449" contextRef="d_2018-07-01_2018-12-31" unitRef="Pure" format="ixt:numdotdecimal" decimals="3" name="us-gaap:EffectiveIncomeTaxRateContinuingOperations" scale="-2">11.2</ix:nonFraction>% for the <em style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">first</em> <em style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">six</em> months of fiscal <em style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">2020</em> and <em style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">2019,</em> respectively. The change in the company&#x2019;s tax rate for the quarter and <em style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">six</em> months ended <em style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;"> December 31, 2019 </em>compared to the quarter and <em style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">six</em> months ended <em style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;"> December 31, 2018 </em>were driven by changes in the composition and amount of the Company&#x2019;s taxable income in</span> fiscal <em style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">2020</em> resulting from the gain on our CCXI investment and discrete tax items.</p>
   <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">&#xa0;</p>
   <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="background-color:null;">The Company recognized total net benefits related to discrete tax items of $<ix:nonFraction id="c54993457" contextRef="d_2019-10-01_2019-12-31" unitRef="USD" format="ixt:numdotdecimal" decimals="-5" name="tech:IncomeTaxExpenseBenefitDiscreteTaxItems" sign="-" scale="6">5.4</ix:nonFraction> million and $<ix:nonFraction id="c54993458" contextRef="d_2019-07-01_2019-12-31" unitRef="USD" format="ixt:numdotdecimal" decimals="-5" name="tech:IncomeTaxExpenseBenefitDiscreteTaxItems" sign="-" scale="6">6.7</ix:nonFraction> million during the quarter and <em style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">six</em> months ended <em style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;"> December 31, 2019, </em>respectively, compared to $<ix:nonFraction id="c54993460" contextRef="d_2018-10-01_2018-12-31" unitRef="USD" format="ixt:numdotdecimal" decimals="-5" name="tech:IncomeTaxExpenseBenefitDiscreteTaxItems" sign="-" scale="6">1.1</ix:nonFraction> million and $<ix:nonFraction id="c54993461" contextRef="d_2018-07-01_2018-12-31" unitRef="USD" format="ixt:numdotdecimal" decimals="-5" name="tech:IncomeTaxExpenseBenefitDiscreteTaxItems" sign="-" scale="6">5.3</ix:nonFraction> million during the quarter and <em style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">six</em> months ended <em style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;"> December 31, 2018, </em>respectively. Share-based compensation excess tax benefit contributed $<ix:nonFraction id="c54993463" contextRef="d_2019-10-01_2019-12-31" unitRef="USD" format="ixt:numdotdecimal" decimals="-5" name="us-gaap:ExcessTaxBenefitFromShareBasedCompensationOperatingActivities" scale="6">3.7</ix:nonFraction>&#xa0;million and $<ix:nonFraction id="c54993464" contextRef="d_2019-07-01_2019-12-31" unitRef="USD" format="ixt:numdotdecimal" decimals="-6" name="us-gaap:ExcessTaxBenefitFromShareBasedCompensationOperatingActivities" scale="6">7.0</ix:nonFraction>&#xa0;million in the quarter and <em style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">six</em> months ended <em style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;"> December 31, 2019, </em>respectively, compared to $<ix:nonFraction id="c54993466" contextRef="d_2018-10-01_2018-12-31" unitRef="USD" format="ixt:numdotdecimal" decimals="-5" name="us-gaap:ExcessTaxBenefitFromShareBasedCompensationOperatingActivities" scale="6">0.3</ix:nonFraction>&#xa0;million and $<ix:nonFraction id="c54993467" contextRef="d_2018-07-01_2018-12-31" unitRef="USD" format="ixt:numdotdecimal" decimals="-5" name="us-gaap:ExcessTaxBenefitFromShareBasedCompensationOperatingActivities" scale="6">3.7</ix:nonFraction> million in the quarter and <em style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">six</em> months, ended <em style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;"> December 31, 2018, </em>respectively. The Company recognized total other immaterial net discrete tax benefits of $<ix:nonFraction id="c54993469" contextRef="d_2019-10-01_2019-12-31" unitRef="USD" format="ixt:numdotdecimal" decimals="-5" name="tech:IncomeTaxExpenseBenefitOtherImmaterialDiscreteTaxItemsNet" sign="-" scale="6">1.7</ix:nonFraction></span><span style="background-color:null;">&#xa0;million&#xa0;in the quarter ended <em style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;"> December 31, 2019 </em>and a net discrete tax expense of $<ix:nonFraction id="c54993470" contextRef="d_2019-07-01_2019-12-31" unitRef="USD" format="ixt:numdotdecimal" decimals="-5" name="tech:IncomeTaxExpenseBenefitOtherImmaterialDiscreteTaxItemsNet" scale="6">0.3</ix:nonFraction> million in the <em style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">six</em> months ended <em style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;"> December 31, 2019&#xa0;</em>compared to $<ix:nonFraction id="c54993472" contextRef="d_2018-10-01_2018-12-31" unitRef="USD" format="ixt:numdotdecimal" decimals="-5" name="tech:IncomeTaxExpenseBenefitOtherImmaterialDiscreteTaxItemsNet" sign="-" scale="6">0.8</ix:nonFraction>&#xa0;million and $<ix:nonFraction id="c54993473" contextRef="d_2018-07-01_2018-12-31" unitRef="USD" format="ixt:numdotdecimal" decimals="-5" name="tech:IncomeTaxExpenseBenefitOtherImmaterialDiscreteTaxItemsNet" sign="-" scale="6">1.6</ix:nonFraction>&#xa0;million of other immaterial net discrete tax benefits in the quarter and <em style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">six</em> months ended <em style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;"> December 31, 2018, </em>respectively.</span></p>
   <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">&#xa0;</p>
   <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">The Company continues to monitor changes in interpretations, assumptions guidance, and additional regulations regarding the Tax Cuts and Jobs Act (the &#x201c;Tax Act&#x201d;), which was enacted on <em style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;"> December 22, 2017. </em>The Company recognizes potential changes to these items could have a material impact on our effective tax rate in future periods.</p>
  </ix:nonNumeric>
  <div>
    &#xa0;
  </div>
  <ix:nonNumeric contextRef="d_2019-07-01_2019-12-31" name="us-gaap:SegmentReportingDisclosureTextBlock" id="c1410178" escape="true">
   <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left;"><i><b><span style="background-color:null;">Note <em style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">13.</em> Segment Information:</span></b></i></p>
   <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left;">&#xa0;</p>
   <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">The Company's management evaluates segment operating performance based on operating income before certain charges to cost of sales and selling, general and administrative expenses, principally associated with acquisition accounting related to inventory, amortization of acquisition-related intangible assets and other acquisition-related expenses.&#xa0; The Protein Sciences and Diagnostics and Genomics segments both include consumables, instruments, services and royalty revenue.</p>
   <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">&#xa0;</p>

   <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left;"><em style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">None.</em></p>

  <p style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left">&#xa0;</p>
  <div>
    &#xa0;
  </div>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: center;"><b><a id="item3" title="item3" href=""></a>ITEM&#xa0;2. MANAGEMENT'S DISCUSSION AND ANALYSIS OF FINANCIAL</b></p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: center;"><b>CONDITION AND RESULTS OF OPERATIONS</b></p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left;">&#xa0;</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">The following management discussion and analysis (&#x201c;MD&amp;A&#x201d;) provides information that we believe is useful in understanding our operating results, cash flows and financial condition. We provide quantitative information about the material sales drivers including the effect of acquisitions and changes in foreign currency at the corporate and segment level. We also provide quantitative information about discrete tax items and other significant factors we believe are useful for understanding our results. The MD&amp;A should be read in conjunction with both the unaudited consolidated financial information and related notes included in this Form 10-Q, and Management&#x2019;s Discussion and Analysis of Financial Condition and Results of Operations included in our Annual Report on Form 10-K for the year ended June 30, 2019. This discussion contains various &#x201c;Non-GAAP Financial Measures&#x201d; and also contains various &#x201c;Forward-Looking Statements&#x201d; within the meaning of the Private Securities Litigation Reform Act of 1995. We refer readers to the statements entitled &#x201c;Non-GAAP Financial Measures&#x201d; and &#x201c;Forward-Looking Information and Cautionary Statements&#x201d; located at the end of Item 2 of this report.</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left;"><b>&#xa0;</b></p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left;"><b>OVERVIEW</b></p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left;">&#xa0;</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left;">Bio-Techne and its subsidiaries, collectively doing business as Bio-Techne Corporation (Bio-Techne, we, our, us or the Company) develop, manufacture and sell biotechnology reagents, instruments and services for the research and clinical diagnostic markets worldwide. With our deep product portfolio and application expertise, we strive to provide the life sciences community with innovative, high-quality scientific tools to better understand biological processes and drive discovery of diagnostic and therapeutic products.</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left;">&#xa0;</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">Consistent with above, we have operated with two segments &#x2013; our Protein Sciences segment and our Diagnostics and Genomics segment during fiscal year 2020. Our Protein Sciences segment is a leading developer and manufacturer of high-quality purified proteins and reagent solutions, most notably cytokines and growth factors, antibodies, immunoassays, biologically active small molecule compounds, tissue culture reagents and T-Cell activation technologies. This segment also includes protein analysis solutions that offer researchers efficient and streamlined options for automated western blot and multiplexed ELISA workflow. Our Genomics and Diagnostics segment develops and manufactures diagnostic products, including FDA-regulated controls, calibrators, blood gas and clinical chemistry controls and other reagents for OEM and clinical customers, as well as a portfolio of clinical molecular diagnostic oncology assays, including the ExoDx&#xae;Prostate(IntelliScore) test for prostate cancer diagnosis. This segment also manufactures and sells advanced tissue-based in-situ hybridization assays (ISH) for research and clinical use.</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">&#xa0;</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;"><b>RECENT ACQUISITIONS</b></p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">&#xa0;</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">A key component of the Company's strategy is to augment internal growth at existing businesses with complementary acquisitions. The Company did not make any acquisitions in the six months ended December 31, 2019. Refer&#xa0;to the prior year Annual Report on form 10-K for additional disclosure&#xa0;regarding the Company's recent acquisitions. &#xa0;&#xa0;</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">&#xa0;</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left;"><b>RESULTS OF OPERATIONS</b></p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left;">&#xa0;</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">Consolidated net sales increased 6%&#xa0; and 9% for the quarter and six months ended December 31, 2019&#xa0;compared to the same prior year periods. Organic growth for the quarter and six months ended December 31, 2019&#xa0;was 6% and 9%, respectively, compared to the same prior year periods, with acquisitions contributing 1% and foreign currency translation having an unfavorable impact of 1% in both comparative periods.&#xa0;</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">&#xa0;</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">Consolidated net earnings increased to $119.6&#xa0;million and $134.0&#xa0;million for the quarter and six months ended <span style="background-color:null;">December 31, 2019, respectively, as compared to $17.6&#xa0;million and $35.0 million in the same prior year periods, which are attributable to current period gains on available-for-sale investments (approximately $121&#xa0;million and $110 million for the quarter and six months ended December 31, 2019, respectively).</span></p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">&#xa0;</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left;"><i><b><span style="background-color:null;">Net Sales</span></b></i></p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left;">&#xa0;</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="background-color:null;">Consolidated net sales for the quarter and six months ended December 31, 2019 were $184.9&#xa0;million and $368.2 million, respectively, an increase of 6% and 9% from the same prior year periods.&#xa0;</span>Organic growth for the quarter and six months ended December 31, 2019&#xa0;was 6% and 9%, respectively, compared to the same prior year periods, with acquisitions contributing 1% and foreign currency translation having an unfavorable impact of 1% in both comparative periods.&#xa0;</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">&#xa0;</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="background-color:null;">For the quarter and six months ended December 31, 2019&#xa0;the Company experienced broad based revenue growth in North America across&#xa0;end markets with&#xa0;China achieving organic revenue growth in excess of 20%.</span></p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">&#xa0;</p>
  <div class="PGBK" style="width: 100%; margin-left: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt">
   <div class="PGNUM" style="text-align: center; width: 100%; margin: 0pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">
     17
   </div>
   <hr />
   <div class="PGHDR" style="text-align: left; width: 100%; margin: 0pt;">
    <a href="#toc">Table of Contents</a>
   </div>
  </div>
  <p style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left">&#xa0;</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left;"><i><b>Gross Margins</b></i></p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left;">&#xa0;</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">Consolidated gross margins for the quarter and six months ended December 31, 2019 were 65.6% and 65.1% respectively, compared to 64.8%&#xa0;and 65.4% for the same prior year periods. Under purchase accounting, inventory is valued <span style="background-color:null;">at fair value less expected selling and marketing costs, resulting in reduced margins in future periods as the inventory is sold. Excluding the impact of acquired inventory sold, stock compensation expense, and amortization of intangibles, adjusted gross margins quarter and six months ended December 31, 2019&#xa0;were 70.6% and 70.0% , respectively compared to 70.9% and 71.4% for the quarter and six months ended December 31, 2018, respectively.&#xa0;Both consolidated gross margins and non-GAAP adjusted gross margins&#xa0;were negatively impacted by unfavorable product mix and foreign exchange rates as compared to the prior year.</span></p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">&#xa0;</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">A reconciliation of the reported consolidated gross margin percentages, adjusted for acquired inventory sold and intangible amortization included in cost of sales, is as follows:</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left;">&#xa0;</p>

     <td style="width: 1%; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin-left: 0pt;"> <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:left;">%</p> </td>
     <td style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&#xa0;</td>
     <td style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&#xa0;</td>
     <td style="text-align: right; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">4.7</td>
     <td style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">%</td>
     <td style="width: 1%; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&#xa0;</td>
     <td style="width: 1%; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&#xa0;</td>

    </tr>
    <tr style="vertical-align: bottom; background-color: rgb(204, 238, 255);">
     <td style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"> <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-left: 18pt;">Stock compensation expense - COGS</p> </td>
     <td style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; padding-bottom: 1px;">&#xa0;</td>

   </tbody>
  </table>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">&#xa0;</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;"><i><b>Selling, General and Administrative Expenses</b></i></p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">&#xa0;</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">Selling, general and administrative expenses increased $4.4&#xa0;million (7%) and $6.4&#xa0;million (5%)&#xa0;for the quarter and six months ended December 31, 2019, respectively, from the same prior year periods. Selling, general, and administrative expense for both the quarter and six months ended December 31, 2019 was impacted by additional employees to scale our businesses. Additionally, selling, general, and administrative expense for the quarter ended December 31, 2019 was impacted by the timing of stock compensation expense from certain new vesting requirements added to the fiscal 2020 stock awards issued in the first&#xa0;quarter.&#xa0;</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">&#xa0;</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left;"><i><b>Research and Development Expenses</b></i></p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left;">&#xa0;</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">Research and development expenses increased $0.6&#xa0;Million (4%) and $1.9&#xa0;million (6%), for the quarter and six month periods ended December 31, 2019, respectively, from the same prior year periods. The increases were driven by recent acquisitions.&#xa0;</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">&#xa0;</p>

     <td style="width: 1%; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin-left: 0pt;"> <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:left;">%</p> </td>

   </tbody>
  </table>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left;"><i>&#xa0;</i></p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">Protein Science&#x2019;s net sales for the quarter and six months ended D<span style="background-color:null;">ecember 31, 2019 were $141.5&#xa0;million and $282.5&#xa0;million, respectively, with reported growth of 4% and 8% compared to the same prior year periods. Organic growth for the quarter and six months ended December 31, 2019 were 4% and 8%, respectively, with acquisitions contributing 1% and currency exchange having an unfavorable impact of 1%. Overall segment growth was driven by&#xa0;consumable products and strong revenue growth in China.</span></p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">&#xa0;</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">The operating margin for the quarter and six months ended December 31, 2019 were 43.0% and 42.6%, respectively, compared to 43.5% and 43.4% for the same prior year periods. Operating income margin was negatively impacted for both comparative periods by the acquisition of B-Mogen in Q4 of FY19 and unfavorable foreign exchange.&#xa0;</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left;"><i>&#xa0;</i></p>
  <div class="PGBK" style="width: 100%; margin-left: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt">
   <div class="PGNUM" style="text-align: center; width: 100%; margin: 0pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">
     18
   </div>

  <table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" class="finTable" style="margin-right: 5%; width: 95%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; text-indent: 0px;">

     <td style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&#xa0;</td>

     <td style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&#xa0;</td>

     <td style="width: 1%; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin-left: 0pt;"> <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:left;">%</p> </td>

  </table>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left;">&#xa0;</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">Diagnostics and Genomics&#x2019; net sales for the quarter and six months ended December 31, 2019 were $43.9&#xa0;million and $86.4 million, respectively, compared to $39.3&#xa0;million and $76.0 million for the same prior year period.&#xa0;Organic growth for the quarter and six months&#xa0;ended December 31, 2019 was 12% and 14% , respectively, with&#xa0;currency exchange having an immaterial impact. Overall segment revenue growth was driven by strong growth in our&#xa0;<i>RNA scope</i>,&#xa0;<i>BaseScope</i>, and hematology products lines.</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">&#xa0;</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">The operating margin for the segment was 2.2% for the quarter and six months ended December 31, 2019 compared to (2.7)% and 1.9%, respectively,&#xa0;for the quarter and six months ended December 31, 2018.&#xa0; Operating income margin was favorably impacted in both comparative periods by volume leverage.</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">&#xa0;</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left;"><i><b>Income Taxes</b></i></p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">&#xa0;</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">Income taxes&#xa0;were at an effective rate of 20.4% and 20.3%&#xa0;of consolidated earnings for the quarter and six month period ended December 31, 2019,&#xa0;respectively, compared to 19.3% and 11.2%&#xa0;for the same prior year periods. The change in the Company&#x2019;s tax rate fo<span style="background-color:null;">r the quarter and six months ended December 31, 2019 was driven by the composition and amount of net income across periods and the impact of discrete tax items&#xa0;of $5.4&#xa0;million and $6.7&#xa0;million, respectively,&#xa0;compared to&#xa0;prior year discrete tax items of $1.1&#xa0;million and $5.3 million&#xa0;as&#xa0;further d</span>iscussed in Note 12.&#xa0;</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">&#xa0;</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">The forecasted tax rate as of the second&#xa0;fiscal quarter of 2020 before discrete items is<span style="background-color:null;"> 26.2% </span>compared to the prior year forecasted tax rate&#xa0;before discrete items of 24.6%. Excluding the impact of discrete items, the Company expects the consolidated income tax rate for the remainder of fiscal 2020 to range from 24% to 28%.</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">&#xa0;</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left;"><i><b>Net Earning</b></i></p>

  <div class="PGBK" style="width: 100%; margin-left: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt">
   <div class="PGNUM" style="text-align: center; width: 100%; margin: 0pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">
     19
   </div>
   <hr />
   <div class="PGHDR" style="text-align: left; width: 100%; margin: 0pt;">
    <a href="#toc">Table of Contents</a>
   </div>
  </div>
  <p style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left">&#xa0;</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">Depending on the nature of discrete tax items, our reported tax rate may not be consistent on a period to period basis. The Company independently calculates a non-GAAP adjusted tax rate considering the impact of discrete items and jurisdictional mix of the identified non-GAAP adjustments. The following table summarizes the reported GAAP tax rate and the effective Non-GAAP adjusted tax rate for the quarter and six months ended December 31, 2019 and December 31, 2018.</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left;">&#xa0;</p>
  <table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" class="finTable" style="margin-right: 5%; width: 95%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; text-indent: 0px;">
   <tbody>

  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">&#xa0;</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">The difference between the reported GAAP tax rate and non-GAAP tax rate applied to the identified non-GAAP adjustments for the quarter ended December 31, 2019 is primarily a result of discrete tax items, including the tax benefit of stock option exercises.</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: center;">&#xa0;</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left;"><b>LIQUIDITY AND CAPITAL RESOURCES</b></p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left;">&#xa0;</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">As of December 31, 2019, cash and cash equivalents and available-for-sale investments were $244.0&#xa0;million compared to $166.0&#xa0;million as of June&#xa0;30, 2019. Included in available-for-sale-investments as of December 31, 2019 was the fair value of the Company's investment in ChemoCentryx, Inc. (CCXI) of $100.0&#xa0;million. The fair value of the Company's CCXI investment at June&#xa0;30, 2019 was $38.2&#xa0;million.</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left;">&#xa0;</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">The Company has a line-of-credit and term loan governed by a Credit Agreement dated August&#xa0;1, 2018. See Note 6 to the Condensed Consolidated Financial Statements for a description of the Credit Agreement.</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left;">&#xa0;</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">The Company has contingent consideration payments of up to $325&#xa0;million, $51&#xa0;million, and $38 million&#xa0;relating&#xa0;to the Exosome, Quad, and B-MoGen acquisitions.&#xa0;The fair value of the remaining payments is $12.6&#xa0;million as of December 31, 2019.</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left;">&#xa0;</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">Management of the Company expects to be able to meet its cash and working capital requirements for operations, facility expansion, capital additions, and cash di<span style="background-color:null;">vidends for the foreseeable future, and at least the next 12 months, through currently available cash, cash generated from operations, and remaining credit available on its existing revolving line of credit.</span></p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left;">&#xa0;</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left;"><i><b><span style="background-color:null;">Cash Flows From Operating Activities</span></b></i></p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left;">&#xa0;</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="background-color:null;">The Company generated cash of $111.0&#xa0;million from operating activities in the six months ended December 31, 2019&#xa0;compared to $86.0&#xa0;million in the six months ended December 31, 2018. The increase from the prior year was primarily due to timing of cash payments on operating assets and liabilities.</span></p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">&#xa0;</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;"><i><b><span style="background-color:null;">Cash Flows From Investing Activities</span></b></i></p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">&#xa0;</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="background-color:null;">We continue to make investments in our business, including capital expenditures. During the six months ended December 31, 2019, the Company received $50.4 million relat</span>ing to selling a portion of our CCXI shares and $18.0&#xa0;million from the maturities of certificates of deposit compared to $5.3 million from proceeds from the maturity of certificates of deposit in the six months ended December 31, 2018. Additionally, the Company did not make any cash payments for acquisitions in the six months ended December 31, 2019 compared to $272.3 million paid in the six months ended December 31, 2019&#xa0; for the Quad and ExosomeDx acquisitions.</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">&#xa0;</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">Capital expenditures for fixed<span style="background-color:null;"> assets for the six months ended December 31, 2019 and December 31, 2018 were $25.1&#xa0;million and $8.8&#xa0;million, respectively. Capital expenditures for the remainder of fiscal 2020 are expected to be approximately $35&#xa0;million. Capital expenditures are expected to be financed through currently available funds and cash generated from operating activities.</span></p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">&#xa0;</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;"><i><b><span style="background-color:null;">Cash Flows From Financing Activities</span></b></i></p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">&#xa0;</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="background-color:null;">During the six months ended December 31, 2019 and December 31, 2018, the Company paid cash dividends of $24.4&#xa0;million and $24.2 million, respectively, to all common shareholders. On February 4, 2020, the Company announced the payment of a $0.32 per share cash dividend, or approximately $12.2&#xa0;million, will be payable February 28, 2020&#xa0;to all common shareholders of record on February 14, 2020.</span></p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">&#xa0;</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="background-color:null;">Cash of $27.2 million and $18.9&#xa0;million was received during the six months ended December 31, 2019 and 2018, respectively, from the exercise of stock options.</span></p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">&#xa0;</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="background-color:null;">During the six months ended December 31, 2019, &#xa0;the Company made payments of $122.3&#xa0;million towards the balance of its line-of-credit facility and term loan. During the six months ended December 31, 2018&#xa0;the Company made payments of $339.0 million towards the balance of its previous line-of-credit facility,&#xa0;borrowed $330.0 million and $250.0 million under its new line-of-credit facility and term loan, respectively. The Company also made payments of $34.3&#xa0;million towards the balance of its new line-of-credit facility and term loan, in the six months ended December 31, 2018.&#xa0;</span></p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left;">&#xa0;</p>
  <div class="PGBK" style="width: 100%; margin-left: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt">
   <div class="PGNUM" style="text-align: center; width: 100%; margin: 0pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">
     20
   </div>
   <hr />
   <div class="PGHDR" style="text-align: left; width: 100%; margin: 0pt;">
    <a href="#toc">Table of Contents</a>
   </div>
  </div>
  <p style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left">&#xa0;</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;"><b>OFF-BALANCE SHEET ARRANGEMENTS</b></p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">&#xa0;</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">The Company has no reportable off-balance sheet arrangements as defined in Item&#xa0;303(a)(4) of Regulation S-K.</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">&#xa0;</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;"><b>CONTRACTUAL OBLIGATIONS</b></p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">&#xa0;</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">Other than the contingent consideration associated with the Exosome, Quad, and B-MoGen&#xa0;and acquisitions, there were no material changes outside the ordinary course of business in the Company's contractual obligations during the quarter or six months ended December 31, 2019.</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left;">&#xa0;</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;"><b>CRITICAL ACCOUNTING POLICIES</b></p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">&#xa0;</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">The Company's significant accounting policies are discussed in the Company's Annual Report on Form 10-K/A for fiscal 2019 and are incorporated herein by reference. The application of certain of these policies requires judgments and estimates that can affect the results of operations and financial position of the Company. Judgments and estimates are used for, but not limited to, valuation of available-for-sale investments, inventory valuation and allowances, valuation of intangible assets and goodwill and valuation of investments in unconsolidated entities. There have been no significant changes in estimates in the&#xa0;quarter or six months ended December 31, 2019 that would require disclosure nor have there been any changes to the Company's policies.</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left;">&#xa0;</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;"><b>NON-GAAP FINANCIAL MEASURES</b></p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;"><b>&#xa0;</b></p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">This Quarterly Report on Form 10-Q, including &#x201c;Management&#x2019;s Discussion and Analysis of Financial Condition and Results of Operation&#x201d; in Item 2, contains financial measures that have not been calculated in accordance with accounting principles generally accepted in the U.S. (GAAP). These non-GAAP measures include:</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left;">&#xa0;</p>
  <table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="width: 100%; text-indent: 0px;">
   <tbody>
    <tr style="vertical-align: top;">
     <td style="width: 9pt;">&#xa0;</td>
     <td style="width: 9pt;"> <p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&#x2022;</p> </td>
     <td> <p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">Organic Growth</p> </td>
    </tr>
    <tr style="vertical-align: top;">
     <td style="width: 9pt;">&#xa0;</td>
     <td style="width: 9pt;"> <p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&#x2022;</p> </td>
     <td> <p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">Adjusted gross margin</p> </td>
    </tr>
    <tr style="vertical-align: top;">
     <td style="width: 9pt;">&#xa0;</td>
     <td style="width: 9pt;"> <p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&#x2022;</p> </td>
     <td> <p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">Adjusted net earnings</p> </td>
    </tr>
    <tr style="vertical-align: top;">
     <td style="width: 9pt;">&#xa0;</td>
     <td style="width: 9pt;"> <p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&#x2022;</p> </td>
     <td> <p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">Adjusted effective tax rate</p> </td>
    </tr>
   </tbody>
  </table>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left;">&#xa0;</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left;">We provide these measures as additional information regarding our operating results. We use these non-GAAP measures internally to evaluate our performance and in making financial and operational decisions, including with respect to incentive compensation. We believe that our presentation of these measures provides investors with greater transparency with respect to our results of operations and that these measures are useful for period-to-period comparison of results.</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left;">&#xa0;</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left;">Our non-GAAP financial measure of organic growth represents revenue growth excluding revenue from acquisitions within the preceding 12 months as well as the impact of foreign currency. Excluding these measures provides more useful period-to-period comparison of revenue results as it excludes the impact of foreign currency exchange rates, which can vary significantly from period to period, and revenue from acquisitions that would not be included in the comparable prior period</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left;">&#xa0;</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left;">Our non-GAAP financial measures for adjusted gross margin&#xa0;and adjusted net earnings&#xa0;exclude the costs recognized upon the sale of acquired inventory, amortization of acquisition intangibles, and acquisition related expenses, inclusive of changes in the fair value of contingent consideration. The Company excludes amortization of purchased intangible assets and purchase accounting adjustments, including costs recognized upon the sale of acquired inventory and acquisition-related expenses inclusive of the changes in the fair value of contingent consideration, from this measure because they occur as a result of specific events, and are not reflective of our internal investments, the costs of developing, producing, supporting and selling our products, and the other ongoing costs to support our operating structure. Additionally, these amounts can vary significantly from period to period based on current activity.</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left;">&#xa0;</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left;">The Company&#x2019;s non-GAAP adjusted&#xa0;net earnings&#xa0;also excludes stock-based compensation expense, which is inclusive the employer portion of payroll taxes of those stock awards, restructuring, impairments of equity method investments, gain and losses from investments, other non-recurring assessments and certain adjustments to income tax expense. Stock-based compensation is excluded from non-GAAP adjusted net earnings because of the nature of this charge, specifically the varying available valuation methodologies, subjective assumptions, and the variety of award types.&#xa0;Impairments of equity investments are excluded as they are not part of our day-to-day operating decisions.&#xa0; Additionally, gains and losses from other investments that are either isolated or cannot be expected to occur again with any predictability are excluded.&#xa0;Costs related to restructuring activities and other non-recurring assessments, including reducing overhead and consolidating facilities, are excluded because we believe they are not indicative of our normal operating costs. The Company independently calculates a non-GAAP adjusted tax rate to be applied to the identified non-GAAP adjustments considering the impact of discrete items on these adjustments and the jurisdictional mix of the adjustments. In addition, the tax impact of other discrete and non-recurring charges which impact our reported GAAP tax rate are adjusted from net earnings. We believe these tax items can significantly affect the period-over-period assessment of operating results and not necessarily reflect costs and/or income associated with historical trends and future results.</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left;">&#xa0;</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left;">The Company periodically reassesses the components of our non-GAAP adjustments for changes in how we evaluate our performance, changes in how we make financial and operational decisions, and considers the use of these measures by our competitors and peers to ensure the adjustments are still relevant and meaningful.</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">&#xa0;</p>
  <div class="PGBK" style="width: 100%; margin-left: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt">
   <div class="PGNUM" style="text-align: center; width: 100%; margin: 0pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">
     21
   </div>
   <hr />
   <div class="PGHDR" style="text-align: left; width: 100%; margin: 0pt;">
    <a href="#toc">Table of Contents</a>
   </div>
  </div>
  <p style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left">&#xa0;</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left;"><b>FORWARD LOOKING INFORMATION AND CAUTIONARY STATEMENTS</b></p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left;">&#xa0;</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">This quarterly report contains forward-looking statements within the meaning of the Private Securities Litigation Reform Act of 1995. Forward-looking statements include those regarding the Company's expectations as to the effect of changes to accounting policies, the amount of capital expenditures for the remainder of the fiscal year, the source of funding for capital expenditure requirements, the sufficiency of currently available funds for meeting the Company's needs, the impact of fluctuations in foreign currency exchange rates, and expectations regarding gross margin fluctuations, increasing research and development expenses, increasing selling, general and administrative expenses and income tax rates. These statements involve risks and uncertainties that may affect the actual results of operations. The following important factors, among others, have affected and, in the future, could affect the Company's actual results: integration of newly acquired businesses, the introduction and acceptance of new products, general national and international economic conditions, increased competition, the reliance on internal manufacturing and related operations, the impact of currency exchange rate fluctuations, the recruitment and retention of qualified personnel, the impact of governmental regulation, maintenance of intellectual property rights, credit risk and fluctuation in the market value of the Company's investment portfolio, and unseen delays and expenses related to facility construction and improvements. For additional information concerning such factors, see the Company's Annual Report on Form 10-K for fiscal 2019 as filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission and Part II. Item 1A below.&#xa0;</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left;">&#xa0;<b>&#xa0;</b></p>

  <p style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left">&#xa0;</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: center;"><b><a id="item4" title="item4" href=""></a>ITEM&#xa0;3. QUANTITATIVE AND QUALITATIVE DISCLOSURES ABOUT MARKET RISK</b></p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left;">&#xa0;</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="background-color:null;">As of December 31, 2019, the Company held an investment in the common stock of CCXI. The investment was included in short-term available-for-sale investments at its fair value of&#xa0;&#xa0;$100.0&#xa0;million. As of December 31&#xa0;2019, the potential loss in fair value due to a 10% decrease in the market value of CCXI was $10&#xa0;million. &#xa0;</span></p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">&#xa0;</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="background-color:null;">The Company operates internationally, and thus is subject to potentially adverse movements in foreign currency exchange rates. For the quarter ended December 31, 2019, approximately&#xa0;34% of consolidated net sales were made in foreign currencies, including 13% in euros, 4% in British pound sterling, 7% in Chinese yuan and the remaining 10% in other currencies. The Company is exposed to market risk mainly from foreign exchange rate fluctuations of the euro, British pound sterling, the Chinese yuan, and the Canadian dollar, as compared to the U.S. dollar as the financial position and operating results of the Company's foreign operations are translated into U.S. dollars for consolidation.</span></p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="background-color:null;">&#xa0;&#xa0;</span></p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">Month-end average exchange rates between the British pound sterling, euro, Chinese yuan and Canadian dollar, which have not been weighted for actual sales volume in the applicable months in the periods, to the U.S. dollar were as follows:</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left;">&#xa0;</p>
  <table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" class="finTable" style="width: 100%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; text-indent: 0px;">
   <tbody>
    <tr style="vertical-align: bottom;">
     <td style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&#xa0;</td>
     <td style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&#xa0;</td>
     <td colspan="6" style="text-align: center; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin-left: 0pt;"> <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:center;"><i><i>Quarter Ended</i></i></p> </td>
     <td style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&#xa0;</td>
     <td style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&#xa0;</td>
     <td colspan="6" style="text-align: center; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin-left: 0pt;"> <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:center;"><i><i>Six Months Ended</i></i></p> </td>

     <td style="width: 9%; border-bottom: 1px none rgb(0, 0, 0); text-align: right; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin-left: 0pt;"><span style="background-color:null;">1.14</span></td>
     <td style="width: 1%; border-bottom: 1px none rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin-left: 0pt;">&#xa0;</td>

  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: center;"><b><a id="item5" title="item5" href=""></a>ITEM&#xa0;4. CONTROLS AND PROCEDURES</b></p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left;">&#xa0;</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left;"><i><b>(a) Evaluation of disclosure controls and procedures.</b></i></p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">&#xa0;</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">The Company maintains disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(e) and 15d-15(e)). The Company's management has evaluated, with the participation of its Chief Executive Officer and Chief Financial Officer, the effectiveness of the design and operation of its disclosure controls and procedures as of the end of the period covered in this Quarterly Report on Form 10-Q. Based on that evaluation, our Chief Executive Officer and Chief Financial Officer concluded that, as of December 31, 2019, our disclosure controls and procedures were effective.</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left;">&#xa0;</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left;"><i><b>(b) Changes in internal controls over financial reporting.</b></i></p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">&#xa0;</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">There were no changes in the Company's internal control over financial reporting during the second&#xa0;quarter of fiscal year 2020 that have materially affected, or are reasonably likely to materially affect, the Company's internal control over financial reporting.</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt;">&#xa0;</p>
  <div class="PGBK" style="width: 100%; margin-left: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt">

  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: center;"><b><a id="item7" title="item7" href=""></a>ITEM&#xa0;1. LEGAL PROCEEDINGS</b></p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left;">&#xa0;</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">As of February 6, 2020, the Company is not a party to any legal proceedings that, individually or in the aggregate, are reasonably expected to have a material adverse effect on the Company's business, results of operations, financial condition or cash flows.</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left;">&#xa0;</p>

  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left;">&#xa0;</p>

  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: center;"><b><a id="item13" title="item13" href=""></a>ITEM&#xa0;6. EXHIBITS</b></p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left;">&#xa0;</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: center;"><b>EXHIBIT INDEX</b></p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: center;"><b>TO</b></p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: center;"><b>FORM 10-Q</b></p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left;">&#xa0;</p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: center;"><b>BIO-TECHNE CORPORATION</b></p>
  <p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: center;">&#xa0;</p>
  <table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="width:100%;text-indent:0;font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;">
   <tbody>
    <tr>
     <td style="vertical-align: top; width: 6%;"> <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:left;">Exhibit</p> <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:left;"><span style="text-decoration: underline; ">Number</span>&#xa0;&#xa0;</p> </td>
     <td style="vertical-align: top; width: 94%;"> <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;"><span style="text-decoration: underline; ">Description</span></p> </td>
    </tr>

     <td style="vertical-align: top; width: 6%;"> <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:left;">104</p> </td>
